entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT, Puvirnituq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:09 PM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Puvirnituq Airport 3:23 PM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016
Condition: Heavy Snow
Temperature: -7.4°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -8.5°C
Wind: NNW 61 km/h gust 71 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard changing to a few flurries this evening and ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northeast 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 26 April 2016
